code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var stateSlice=createSlice({name:'notificationPanel/state',initialState:false,reducers:{toggleNotificationPanel:function toggleNotificationPanel(state,action){return!state;},openNotificationPanel:function openNotificationPanel(state,action){return true;},closeNotificationPanel:function closeNotificationPanel(state,action){return false;}}});var _stateSlice$actions=stateSlice.actions,toggleNotificationPanel=_stateSlice$actions.toggleNotificationPanel,openNotificationPanel=_stateSlice$actions.openNotificationPanel,closeNotificationPanel=_stateSlice$actions.closeNotificationPanel;export{toggleNotificationPanel,openNotificationPanel,closeNotificationPanel};export var selectNotificationPanelState=function selectNotificationPanelState(_ref){var notificationPanel=_ref.notificationPanel;return notificationPanel.state;};export default stateSlice.reducer;
